SELECT A.SEQ ,A.ID ,A.NAME ,A.DESCRIPTION ,A.USE_YN ,A.REG_USER ,A.REG_DATE ,B.ATTAFILE_GROUP_SEQ AS FILE_SEQ ,B.ORGNFILE_NM FROM GBL_BOARD_SAMPLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTAFILE_INFO B ON A.FILE_SEQ = B.ATTAFILE_GROUP_SEQ AND B.DEL_CD = 'N' WHERE 1=1
AND A.ID LIKE '%${SEARCH_VALUE}%'
AND A.SEQ = #{SEQ}
ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC
